sentences.sentence: The school offers two modules in Teaching English as a Foreign Language, viz. Principles and Methods of Language Teaching and Applied Linguistics.
sentences.translation: 该校提供两个模块用于英语作为外语的教学，即语言教学的原理方法和应用语言学。

sentences.sentence: The Course bean will have two properties defined viz.
sentences.translation: Course bean将有两个属性，分别用于定义viz。

sentences.sentence: It also includes descriptions of representations, viz., the XML documents in this example.
sentences.translation: 它还包含了表示的描述，即示例中的XML文档。
